titles.title: Fixing the daily hour of meeting of the First Session of the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.
Fixing the daily hour of meeting of the First Session of the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
This resolution provides that, unless otherwise ordered, the hour of daily meeting of the House of Representatives is
Monday at 2:00 p.m.; Tuesday at 12:00 p.m. (noon) or, if no legislative business was conducted on the preceding Monday, at 2:00 p.m.;Wednesdays and Thursdays at 12:00 pm (noon); and9:00 a.m. on all other days of the week.
